ensg.tsig.chimn

Class MyResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensg.tsig.chimn.MyResource

  • @Path(value="myresource")
public class MyResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Root resource (exposed at "myresource" path). This is the servelt of the chimn project. It calls the controllers Isogeo and Publisher. It contains the methods below : public void initializeIsogeo() public void initializePublisher() public String getRun() public void runPythonScript() public String postParameters() public JSONObject getTags() public JSONObject getFormatD() public JSONObject getSrsD() public String postSaveCmd() public String postAuthentification () public String formatCheckedToDB() public PreferenceSRS srsCheckedToDB() public String serviceCheckedToDB() public String getTeleversement() public String criteresToDB()

      • initializeIsogeo

      • getRun

        @GET
 @Path(value="/run/")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String getRun()
        This method initializes attributes for the current instance and tests updating metadata in chimn database. Then it runs python televersement script and publish OGC services. It's called by an ajax GET method connected to the button "GO !" on preferences jsp page.
        Returns:
        string message that will be returned as a text/plain media type to the client.

      • runPythonScript

        public void runPythonScript(java.lang.String path)
        This method reads the output from the python command and any errors from this attempted command.
        Parameters:
        path -

      • postParameters

        @POST
 @Path(value="/parameters/")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String postParameters(@FormParam(value="hoteBDD")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String dbhote,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="portBDD")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String dbport,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="bdd")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String dbname,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="userBDD")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String dbuser,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="passwordBDD")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String dbpsw,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="hoteGS")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String gshote,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="portGS")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String gsport,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="userGS")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String gsuser,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="passwordGS")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String gspsw,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="idI")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String isid,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="secretI")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String issecret,
                                                                                                                                                               @FormParam(value="urlSD")
                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String tlurl)
        This method gets parameters entered by the administrator from the website, and stores them in chimn database. It's called by an ajax POST method connected to the button "enregistrer les paramétrages" on parametrages jsp page.
        Parameters:
        dbhote -
        dbport -
        dbname -
        dbuser -
        dbpsw -
        gshote -
        gsport -
        gsuser -
        gspsw -
        isid -
        issecret -
        tlurl -
        Returns:
        null

      • getTags

        @POST
 @Path(value="/tags/")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getTags(@FormParam(value="q")
                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String q)
        This method return a list of tags on metadata from isogeo and show them in preferences page on the website. It's called automatically by an ajax GET method when preferences page is loaded.
        Parameters:
        q -
        Returns:
        j that will be returned as a json media type to the client.

      • getFormatD

        @GET
 @Path(value="/cmdFormat/")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getFormatD()
        This method gets formats stored in chimn database (those entered by administrator) in the dynamic extraction page on the website. It allows the user to choose between these formats to order. It's called automatically by an ajax GET method when the page is loaded.
        Returns:
        j that will be returned as a json media type to the client.

      • getSrsD

        @GET
 @Path(value="/cmdSrs/")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getSrsD()
        This method gets the srs stored in chimn database (those entered by administrator) in the dynamic extraction page on the website. It allows the user to choose between these formats to make his command. It's called automatically by an ajax GET method when the page is loaded.
        Returns:
        j that will be returned as a json media type to the client.

        @POST
 @Path(value="/saveCmd/")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String postSaveCmd(@FormParam(value="username")

                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="point1lat")

                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="titledata")

 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")

public java.lang.String postAuthentification(@FormParam(value="ident")

                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String mdp)

        Parameters:
        login -
        mdp -
        Returns:
        successAdmin that will be returned as a text/plain media type to the client

      • getTeleversement

        @GET
 @Path(value="/televersement/")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String getTeleversement()
        This method gets the url of the distant server entered in chimn database by the administrator. It's called automatically by an ajax GET method from the client when the page is loaded. The url will serve for the downloading of the data by the user.
        Returns:
        tlurl that will be returned as a text/plain media type to the client

      • criteresToDB

        @POST
 @Path(value="/critere/")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String criteresToDB(@FormParam(value="license")
                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String licenseVal,

                                                                                                                                                          @FormParam(value="periodicity")
                                                                                                                                                          int periodicityVal)
